ComicInfo.Summary:
AXIS tie-in!
Oh, man...you know that totally secret thing that’s gonna happen in AXIS?
Yeah—that’s totally gonna affect Deadpool!
The original Human Torch only appears on the Deadpool 75th Marvel variants.
Notes:
The 75 Years of Marvel Deadpool Variant cover is a homage and a parody of the cover of Marvel Comics #1.
